BodyName: Committee on Mental Health, Developmental Disability, Alcoholism, Substance Abuse and Disability Services

Items.Title: Oversight - Update on the Crystal Methamphetamine Education and Prevention Initiative
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Update on the Crystal Methamphetamine Education and Prevention Initiative

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the Governor of the State of New York to consider enacting legislation declaring psuedoephedrine, an essential ingredient in the making of methamphetamine, a controlled substance in order to restrict the of sale of over-the-counter cold medicine containing this ingredient, and further calling on the federal government to support the “Combat Meth Act of 2005.”
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Enact legislation declaring psuedoephedrine, an essential ingredient in the making of methamphetamine, a controlled substance.

Items.Title: Oversight - Update on the Crystal Methamphetamine Education and Prevention Initiative

Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Enact legislation declaring psuedoephedrine, an essential ingredient in the making of methamphetamine, a controlled substance.

Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Amended by Committee
Items.MatterName: Enact legislation declaring psuedoephedrine, an essential ingredient in the making of methamphetamine, a controlled substance.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the Governor of the State of New York to consider enacting legislation declaring psuedoephedrine, an essential ingredient in the making of methamphetamine, a controlled substance in order to restrict the of sale of over-the-counter cold medicine containing this ingredient, and further calling on the federal government to support the “Combat Meth Act of 2005.”
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Enact legislation declaring psuedoephedrine, an essential ingredient in the making of methamphetamine, a controlled substance.
